title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text:
A test point should be a point not on the line. Choose $$(0,0)$$ as a test point to see if it is a solution.
$$y<-2x+2$$
$$0<-2	imes0+2$$
$$0<2$$

title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text: $$(0,0)$$ is a solution to $$y<-2x+2$$. Since $$(0,0)$$ is on the left side of the line, we shade the left side of the boundary line in red.\n##figure4.gif##

title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text:
A test point should be a point not on the line. Choose $$(0,0)$$ as a test point to see if it is a solution.
$$y \geq -x-1$$
$$0 \geq -0-1$$
$$0 \geq -1$$

title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
